issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
{code}
create table customer_reload 
	stored as orc as 
select 	c.c_custkey,
		c.c_name, 
		c.c_acctbal, 
		cast (c.c_custkey as bigint) 
from customer c;
{code}

Create table schema 
{code}
# col_name            	data_type           	comment

c_custkey           	int
c_name              	string
c_acctbal           	double
_c3                 	bigint
{code}

Analyze table command 
{code}
analyze table customer_reload compute statistics for columns;
{code}

Exception 
{code}
hive> analyze table customer_reload compute statistics for columns;
NoViableAltException(13@[323:1: atomExpression : ( ( KW_NULL )=> KW_NULL -> TOK_NULL | ( constant )=> constant | castExpression | caseExpression | whenExpression | ( functionName LPAREN )=> function | tableOrColumn | LPAREN ! expression RPAREN !);])

fields.summary: CTAS : Allows user to create table without explicit column names which fails stats creation on new table

comments.body: [~mmokhtar], the problem is that  "_c3" is not allowed in the parser. I assume that this "_c3" is given by Calcite?
